snippet: One of the country’s largest producers of ammunition magazines for guns is leaving Colorado because of new state laws that restrict how many rounds a magazine can hold.
abstract: Magpul Industries Corporation, one of the country’s largest producers of ammunition magazines for guns, is leaving Colorado and moving to Wyoming and Texas because of new state laws that include restrictions on how many rounds a magazine can hold.
lead_paragraph: One of the country’s largest producers of ammunition magazines for guns is leaving Colorado because of new state laws that restrict how many rounds a magazine can hold.
